statements: SELECT * FROM drug_ingredients LIMIT 10;
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name, purchase_date FROM drug_ingredients WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT batch_number, supplier_name, expiration_date FROM drug_ingredients WHERE purchase_date < '2023-06-15';
SELECT id, ingredient_name, supplier_name, expiration_date FROM drug_ingredients ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE 'Acetaminophen%';
SELECT * FROM drug_ingredients
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name FROM drug_ingredients WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM drug_ingredients ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT ingredient_name, batch_number, expiration_date FROM drug_ingredients WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT id, supplier_name FROM drug_ingredients WHERE batch_number = 'B12345'
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_id FROM ingredients WHERE date_received = '2022-08-15';
SELECT formulation_name, date_manufactured, traceability_code FROM drug_formulations WHERE batch_number = 'ABC123';
SELECT ingredient_name, formulation_name, date_manufactured FROM ingredients JOIN drug_formulations ON ingredients.ingredient_id = drug_formulations.active_ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE supplier_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE 'Acetaminophen%';
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_id FROM ingredients WHERE date_received > '2022-01-01';
SELECT formulation_name, date_manufactured FROM drug_formulations WHERE batch_number = '12345';
SELECT ingredient_name, formulation_name FROM ingredients JOIN drug_formulations ON ingredients.ingredient_id = drug_formulations.active_ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient;
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_id FROM ingredient ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, formula FROM drug WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_usage WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT ingredient_id, drug_id, quantity FROM ingredient_usage ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_usage WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT i.ingredient_name, d.drug_name FROM ingredient i INNER JOIN drug d ON i.supplier_id = d.manufacturer_id
SELECT d.drug_name, i.ingredient_name FROM drug d LEFT JOIN ingredient i ON d.drug_id = i.ingredient_id
SELECT i.ingredient_id, i.ingredient_name, COUNT(u.usage_id) AS total_usage FROM ingredient i LEFT JOIN ingredient_usage u ON i.ingredient_id = u.ingredient_id GROUP BY i.ingredient_id

SELECT i.ingredient_name, d.drug_name, u.quantity AS usage_quantity FROM ingredient i INNER JOIN drug d ON i.supplier_id = d.manufacturer_id INNER JOIN ingredient_usage u ON i.ingredient_id = u.ingredient_id
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT name, supplier, expiry_date FROM ingredients WHERE supplier='ABC Suppliers';
SELECT id, name FROM drugs ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT formulation_name, quantity FROM formulations WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT manufacturer, production_date FROM traceability WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE expiry_date < CURDATE() ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT drugs.name, formulations.formulation_name, formulations.quantity FROM drugs JOIN formulations ON drugs.id = formulations.drug_id WHERE formulations.quantity > 100 ORDER BY drugs.name DESC
SELECT ingredients.name, ingredients.supplier, drugs.name FROM ingredients JOIN drugs ON ingredients.id = drugs.ingredient_id WHERE drugs.dosage > 50 ORDER BY ingredients.name, drugs.name

SELECT formulations.formulation_name, traceability.manufacturer, traceability.production_date FROM formulations JOIN traceability ON formulations.drug_id = traceability.ingredient_id WHERE traceability.production_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY traceability.production_date DESC

SELECT formulations.*, traceability.* FROM formulations JOIN traceability ON formulations.drug_id = traceability.ingredient_id WHERE formulations.quantity < 50 AND traceability.manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals' ORDER BY formulations.quantity, traceability.production_date
SELECT * FROM Ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier, quantity FROM Ingredients WHERE date_received > '2022-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, formulation, expiration_date FROM Drugs ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT formulation_name, production_date, quantity_produced FROM Formulations WHERE quantity_produced > 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT manufacturer_name, contact_person, location FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT drug_name, formulation, expiration_date FROM Drugs JOIN Formulations ON Drugs.drug_id = Formulations.drug_id;
SELECT manufacturer_name, contact_person, location FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE 'P%' AND location = 'USA';
SELECT formulation_name, production_date FROM Formulations WHERE quantity_produced < 500 ORDER BY production_date;
SELECT * FROM BatchRecords WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
